name: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy
description:
Experience tilt maze action like never before; when a wicked witch casts her curse upon the world, it is up to one raccoon cub to stop her! Play as Roxy as she rolls through three unique worlds in order to end the witch’s evil plan!

Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy is a Tilt Maze/Labyrinth style game with unique mechanics, boss battles and powerups. Play through the next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga, compete in various game modes and customize & create your own levels, then share them with the world!

Classic Tilt Maze Action with Powerups, Boss Battles and Creative Puzzles!

Create and Share your own levels with the world and Download others off the workshop!

3 Distinct Biomes, each with their own unique mechanics and traps!

Multiple Game Modes: Story mode, Arcade, Time Trials, Maze Generator & Custom Level creation!

Rapid Ryan’s Arcade: Experience a collection of minigames unrelated to the main experience.

Online Achievements and Leaderboards will showcase your mastery to the world!

Customize your appearance as you unlock colorful new cosmetics and accessories!
